pages.text: Ta.Sina, iha a'itam hana kura'ana di'am ate ika sapasata kitaba di'am
Hada'itam ate khusakhabari imana vali'am de la'i
Jihare namaza parhade hana ate zakata dide hana ate uha akhirata ute yakina rakhade hana
Jihare loka, praloka (akhirata) upara visavasa nahim rakhade, unham de karamam nu asim unham la'i khubasurata bana dite hana, isa la'i uha bhataka rahe hana
Iha loka hana, `jinham la'i buri saza hai ate iha praloka vica bahuta ghate vica rahinage
Ate besaka kura'ana tuhanu ika janijana ate gi'ana vale valom dita ja riha hai
Jadom musa ne apane ghara vali'am nu kiha, ki maim ika aga dekhi hai. Saim uthom ko'i khabara li'a'unda ham jam aga da ko'i agara li'a'unda ham tam ki tusim seka seko
Phira jadom uha usa de kola pahuci'a tam avaza a'i ki mubaraka hai uha jihara aga vica hai ate usa de kaula hai ate paka hai alaha jihara pure jagata da palanahara hai
He musa! Iha maim ham alaha, zoravara ate si'anapa vala

Ate tusim apani soti suta devo. Phira jadom usane usanu isa taram calade ho'e dekhi'a, jivem uha sapa hove tam uha piche muri'a ate palata ke nahim dekhi'a. He musa! Dara na, mere sahamane paigabara dari'a nahim karade
Paratu jisa ne julama kita. Phira usa ne bura'i tom ba'ada usa nu neki vica badala dita, tam maim mu'afa karana vala kirapalu ham

Ate tusim apana hatha apane galame (girebana) vica pa'u, uha kise kami tom sinam cita nikalega. Dovem mila ke naum nisani'am de nala phiraauauna ate usa di kauma de kola ja'u. Besaka uha zalima loka hana
Isa la'i jado unham kola sadi'am sapasata nisani'am a'i'am tam unham ne akhi'a, ki iha tam pratakha jadu hai
